name: Retro Rosso
description: Retro Rosso is a charming oscilloscope-themed robot. With its vibrant red color reminiscent of the classic Ferrari Rosso Corsa, this robot is a true head-turner. Equipped with a retro console for buttons and a pair of arms and legs designed in a hand-down style, Retro Rosso is a perfect blend of vintage aesthetics and modern technology. Its screen displays the iconic game of Snake, adding a touch of nostalgia to its overall design. Retro Rosso is a proud member of the WebtrES club, where it showcases its unique oscillating abilities and contributes to the advancement of the digital realm.
